# Core Team Skills

This directory contains core infrastructure and utility skills managed by the core team.

## Skills in this directory

### Skill Orchestrator
**Status**: Approved  
**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Description**: Pipeline execution with context passing

### Skill Profiler
**Status**: Approved  
**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Description**: Latency percentiles tracking (p50/p95/p99)

### SkillsMP Integration
**Status**: Approved  
**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Description**: SkillsMP.com platform integration

## Adding new skills

1. Create a new directory for your skill
2. Add SKILL.md with proper YAML frontmatter
3. Submit a Pull Request
4. Request review from @Dykij or @core-team (via CODEOWNERS)

## Team Contact

**Team**: @core-team  
**Lead**: @Dykij
